resources.string: Why? Make money and do something good!\n How? Make cool, interesting, and better products than what\'s available.\n What? Leveraging general coding and hacking skills so that I can be a ninja in any type of development. From Cassandra to Angular, Enterprise Java to Python and Flask!

3 Quantitative Accomplishments of mine:
 		I am at level Captain on CodeFights and have won over 70 tournaments
 		I amm trained by the SPCA to help abused animals learn to trust people again
 		I have reviewed over 800 Udacity Student Projects for Full-stack Web Dev and Android Nanodegrees


3 Qualities I Possess:
 		Expressive, enjoy the process of expressing ideas and ideas in general (may philosophize too much =P)
 		Curious, makes it easy to learn things (can fall down Wikipedia rabbit holes)
 		Thorough, love spending time in the state of flow, creating (not too attentive to deadlines)


I am definitely more Right Brained, however I am much more cerebral than limbic. I enjoy the state of flow. That creativity and being in the moment is awesome!
